description: This file defines a fake repository class `FakeRecipeRepository` used for testing or preview purposes in a Kotlin project. It provides methods to retrieve all recipes, search recipes by title, and get a recipe by ID, with artificial delays to simulate network latency.

classes.name: FakeRecipeRepository
classes.description: A fake repository class that provides methods to retrieve and search recipe data, primarily for testing or preview purposes.

methods.name: getAllRecipes
methods.description: Returns all recipes after a small artificial delay.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Searches for recipes whose titles contain the specified query string, ignoring case.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a recipe by its ID, or null if not found.
